summary: that secret that you know (but you don't know how to tell)
title: that secret that you know (but you don't know how to tell)
description:
by longhairandbarefeet

“Did you like it?” Jon asks anxiously. He’s turning the knob down on the radio, and is biting at the skin on his chapped lips, it’s a nervous habit of his to do, but it’s a bad habit of hers to wish he’d do that to her mouth instead. The thought of him reaching over, kissing her, and pushing his teeth into the skin of her bottom lip causes warmth to spread in her body like fire in her veins, a much-accepted feeling in the middle of the night, in the middle of December, and in a car without heat.

aka

a modern jon and arya au

tags: i too wish jon would come back soon
so they could be one happy little fam
title: S7 Budget!AU
body:
Okay but imagine one thing. GoT team doesn’t mess up and actually includes Ghost in the script.

Think of the reunions.

Littlefinger bores talks to Sansa in the courtyard but they’re interrupted by Ghost. He ignores Littlefinger, looking at Sansa and wagging his tail, slowly backing away towards the gate. And suddenly she just knows.

When Arya comes home, the guards won’t let her in. Ghost comes between them, growls at the two morons angrily and licks Arya’s face. “Welcome home, Auntie. Mom’s upstairs.”

And then he fucking eats Littlefinger alive being all like: “Jon Snow sends his regards.”

summary: "He's to marry Arya Stark. My little sister." Jon could almost see her in that moment, long-faced and gawky, all knobby knees...
body:
“He’s to marry Arya Stark. My little sister.” Jon could almost see her in that moment, long-faced and gawky, all knobby knees and sharp elbows, with her dirty face and tangled hair. […] His fingers closed around the parchment. Would that they could crush Ramsay Bolton’s throat as easily.

Gendry was at his forge, bare-chested beneath his leather apron. He was beating on a sword as if he wished it were a foe, his sweat-soaked hair falling across his brow.

its unclear what exactly gendry believes happened to arya but if he does think she was sold to the boltons then the parallels between him and jon at this point are even stronger. both of arya’s bastard boys are devastated by this news and want to kill the man arya allegedly married. their mundane actions (crushing a letter, working on a sword) are likened to violent acts against explicitly in jons case - ramsay. its left ambiguous in gendrys since he’s no pov but i think its safe to assume his imagined foe is whoever he believes hurt arya

Gendry was at his forge, bare-chested beneath his leather apron. He was beating on a sword as if he wished it were a foe, his sweat-soaked hair falling across his brow.

its unclear what exactly gendry believes happened to arya but if he does think she was sold to the boltons then the parallels between him and jon at this point are even stronger. both of arya’s bastard boys are devastated by this news and want to kill the man arya allegedly married. their mundane actions (crushing a letter, working on a sword) are likened to violent acts against explicitly in jons case - ramsay. its left ambiguous in gendrys since he’s no pov but i think its safe to assume his imagined foe is whoever he believes hurt arya

summary:
Jon: I have a plan. It might get us all killed, but if it works it will be a totally boss story. Cool?
Sansa: no, it's...
body:
Jon: I have a plan. It might get us all killed, but if it works it will be a totally boss story. Cool?

Sansa: no, it’s not!

Arya: cool!

Sansa: no! It’s not cool!

summary: The only realistic reunion between Arya and Gendry will be if she punches him in the face (with love) or she starts yelling at...
body: The only realistic reunion between Arya and Gendry will be if she punches him in the face (with love) or she starts yelling at him (with love). Gendry of course will come in with the bear hug that will threaten to suffocate Arya (with love) and overall they just need to seriously confuse the rest of the stark clan.

blog.name: ao3feed-jonrya
blog.title: AO3feed-Jonrya
blog.description: An automated feed for Jon x Arya fics posted on AO3.

title: I owe it to myself
description:
by creepychan025

“We we’re going straight to the Eastwatched-by-the-sea and meet up with Tormund.” Ser Davos informed the King of brooding. “I already sent a raven. It should arrive days before us. You said he would be willing to help.”

“No.” Jon said making the frown in Davos face deepened. “We’re stopping by at the Winterfell shortly before going to the Eastwatched-by-the-sea.”

“Your grace–”

“This is a suicide mission, you said so yourself, then its all the more reason I need to go to Winterfell.” Jon said with conviction. “I need to see Bran and Arya. I owe it to myself.”

A FIX IT. Because Jon’s reaction in the show is such a shame.

Words: 2115, Chapters: ½, Language: English

Series: Part 2 of This love left a permanent mark

  • Fandoms: Game of Thrones (TV)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Jon Snow, Arya Stark, Sansa Stark, Davos Seaworth, Bran Stark, Daenerys Targaryen, Varys (ASoIaF), Tormund Giantsbane
  • Relationships: Jon Snow/Arya Stark, Jon Snow & Arya Stark
  • Additional Tags: Not Incest, implied tho?, Reunion, FIx It, little angst, If You Squint - Freeform, idk what it is but i love jonrya so

body: My favourite Starks! The Jon and Arya sibling relationship is beautiful. Best relationship in series, and it’s perfectly platonic!

blog.name: andloveisenough
blog.title: And Love is Enough
blog.description: “My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.”

summary:
Sophie Turner saying: Sansa rejected Tyrion for being a Lannister
 Sansa was a prisoner of Littlefinger
 It was disgusting to...
body:
Sophie Turner saying:

  • Sansa rejected Tyrion for being a Lannister
  • Sansa was a prisoner of Littlefinger
  • It was disgusting to see LF again
  • Sansa had no choice in marrying Ramsay Bolton
  • Sansa saved the day at the Battle of the Bastards
  • Sansa is the Lady of Winterfell
  • Sansa and Arya realise that they work very well together.
  • Sansa, Arya, and Bran form the perfect unit

blog.name: maisiestyle
blog.title: Maisie Williams | Arya Stark | Styles & Musings

summary:
Great recap interview by Maisie Williams of Arya’s journey! Some nice hints for the future of her story in Season 8.  
Maisie...
caption:
Great recap interview by Maisie Williams of Arya’s journey! Some nice hints for the future of her story in Season 8.

Maisie says, after LF’s death, the show wants to make a conscious decision to show Arya has changed in her final scene of S7 with Sansa. Which goes along nicely with Maisie’s recent comments about seeing a lighter more fun side to Arya in S8. Maisie also made it very clear that she got to do everything she wanted for Arya in S8 which makes what she has said (in an interview after reading the S8 scripts) of what she wants for Arya very enlightening:

Do you have ideas about how you’d like Arya’s journey to end?

Maisie: I’ve always said I wanted her to find peace. The things that have been driving her through her story have been very bitter and twisted and aggressive. I would love for Arya to find her true self again and let go of this anger and revenge that’s accompanied her on this journey. I’d love for her to be happy.

At CCXP in Brazil last week, she also said this:

The actors were forbidden in the interview to talk about the series’ eighth season, but Maisie also gave clues to Arya’s future. “Back to Winterfell was amazing, it was her focus throughout the show,” she says. “In this new season she has completely different goals, which she has never had before,” she says.
Interesting.
